attributes.action: Recognise the Chucle Brothers for their contribution and dedication to childrens entertainment over the last 30years with arecognition in the New Years Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paul and Barry have dedicated their lives to entertaining Kids ( and big Kids) over the last thirty years and are true proffesionals in what they do. They are dedicated to what they do so lets recognise them

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
